author: Anonymous Atom
title: Lab 1
question: I am a student on the waitlist. I finished my lab 1 but I did not spdhandin, instead I asked the TA to check it over on Monday. I read that students on the waitlist have the labs they could not attend excused. Does that mean only the TA portion is excused or the whole lab? I was under the impression that the whole thing is removed and we are only doing the labs to learn the material.
student_answer: I believe the entire lab is excused.
